title: One man dead, four others shot in gang shooting
content:
Autoplay:
BUFFALO, N.Y. (WKBW) - One man was killed and four others injured Saturday night in what Buffalo Police are calling a gang-related shooting.
Eighteen-year-old Alonzo Scott of Buffalo died from his injuries after he was shot on Warren Avenue near Broadway last night.
A 25-year-old man is listed in serious condition, and a 23-year-old woman is listed in fair condition. Both are being treated at ECMC.
Two other men were treated and released.
If you have any information, call the confidential tipline at 716-847-2255.
